verse: सदेव सोम्येदमग्र आसीदेकमेवाद्वितीयम्‌॥ तद्धैक आहुरसदेवेदमग्र आसीदेकमेवाद्वितीयं तस्मादसतः सज्जायत॥

terms.In the beginning, there was only one tru: faced one. It is called the non-existent/false god, as this too existed in the beginning as the one without a second. Therefore, from non-existence/falsehood, it arose.
